name: Näkemisen ja silmäterveyden toimiala ry - Finnish Association of Vision and Eyecare
goal:
NÄE is a branch association for vision & eyecare/optical services; for optical chains, individual optometrists and private eye clinics. It is active in fields of business policy, healthcare policy, professional development and renewal of service models.

Over 80% of Finnish eyecare enterprises are members of NÄE.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
-digital single market issues
-ehealth issues
-mutual evaluation of professions and its further steps
-professional qualifications directive
-medical devices directive
-CE-marking issues
-GDPR
